Package com.app.springbackend.security.jwt

Class JwtUtils

java.lang.Object
com.app.springbackend.security.jwt.JwtUtils
@Service public class JwtUtils extends Object
Provides JWT token utilities.

    • generateTokenCookie

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseCookie generateTokenCookie(UserDetailsImpl userDetails)
      Generates a JWT token stored in a cookie for a given UserDetailsImpl object.
      Parameters:
      userDetails - UserDetailsImpl to generate a token for.
      Returns:
      ResponseCookie containing the JWT token.

    • getTokenFromCookies

      public String getTokenFromCookies(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Retrieves a JWT token from cookies in the provided HttpServletRequest.
      Parameters:
      request - The HttpServletRequest which may include a JWT token in the cookies.
      Returns:
      JWT token if found in the cookies, otherwise null.

    • extractUsername

      public String extractUsername(String token)
      Extracts the username from the JWT token.
      Parameters:
      token - A String representing the JWT token.
      Returns:
      A String representing the username extracted from the JWT token.

    • extractClaim

      public <T> T extractClaim(String token, Function<io.jsonwebtoken.Claims,T> claimsResolver)
      Extracts a claim from the JWT token using a provided claims resolver function.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the claim being extracted.
      Parameters:
      token - A String representing the JWT token.
      claimsResolver - A Function that extracts a specific claim from a set of Claims.
      Returns:
      The claim extracted from the JWT token.

    • generateToken

      public String generateToken(UserDetailsImpl userDetails)

    • generateToken

      public String generateToken(Map<String,Object> extraClaims, UserDetailsImpl userDetails)
      Generates a JSON Web Token (JWT) with the given extra claims and user details, signed with a secure key.
      Parameters:
      extraClaims - additional claims to include in the JWT payload.
      userDetails - user details to be included in the JWT payload as the "sub" (subject) claim.
      Returns:
      a signed JWT with the given extra claims and user details.

    • isTokenValid

      public boolean isTokenValid(String token)
      Checks whether a given JWT token is valid for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      token - the JWT token to validate
      Returns:
      true if the token is valid for the user, false otherwise.
